name: facing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an extra layer of material sewn to the inside edge of a piece of clothing to make it stronger, or to the outside, especially of collars and the ends of sleeves, for decoration: a blue jacket with white facing
[ C ] mainly UK (US usually veneer) an outer layer covering a wall, etc.: The wall was built of rubble with a facing of stone.
